meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unimportant.
meanings.sent1: She felt the unimportance of her role in the school play.
meanings.sent2: The unimportance of the small details became evident in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unimportance, the tiny pebble managed to steal the show.
meanings.sent4: In the vast universe, our daily problems seem to shrink into unimportance.
meanings.sent5: The unimportance of the decision was emphasized by the flip of a coin.

meanings.sent1: The unimportance of the old toy was evident as it gathered dust on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: His unimportance in the company led to his decision to seek new opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The unimportance of the situation made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The unimportance of material possessions became clear after the storm destroyed everything.
meanings.sent5: She realized the unimportance of fame when she found true happiness in simple moments.
